channel.title: ---[PI] Pkzallday (Team Needed)---
channel.description:
[img]http://pkzallday.freeforums.org/download/file.php?logo=__pkzallday1.png[/img] [size=14pt][b]Hi everyone that reads this, My name is Joe and I'm looking for a Devlopment Team for the [PI] 317 Server.[/b][/size] [size=13pt]-Team-[/size] NEED, 1.Source Coder:_________ 2.Client Coder:__________ [b][size=14pt]What My GOALS are: [/size][/b] [b]1.[/b] 100%Agility 100%Construction 100%Cooking 100%Crafting 100%Farming 100%Firemaking 100%Fishing 100%Fletching 100%Herblore 100%Hunter 100%Mining 100%Prayer 100%Runecrafting 100%Slayer 100%Smithing 100%Thieving 100%Woodcutting [b]2.[/b] 100% Attack emotes [b]3.[/b] 100% Pvping [b]Much More but cant Remember.. lol[/b] [b]4.[/b] Cursed Prayers [img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091218050329/runescape/images/c/ce/Curse_Interface.png[/img] [b] 5.[/b] New Lunar [img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20081020160448/runescape/images/archive/1/19/20090728180900!Lunar-spells.PNG[/img] [b]6.[/b] New Ancients [img]http://www.runescaperegistry.com/marlainesblog/wp-content/uploads/2007/07/ancient-magic.PNG[/img] [b]7.[/b] G.E (Grand Exchange) [If Possible] [img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/a/a1/LHCGE.PNG[/img] [b]8.[/b] Great Economy [img]http://www.farmer100.com/upload/hot_rs/Runescape_Money1.gif[/img] [b]9.[/b] --A Very stable server [b]10.[/b] --Have a decent player average [b]11.[/b] --Fun to play server [b]12.[/b] --Very few glitches [b]13.[/b] --Good Team, Staff. [b] 14.[/b] [b][size=18pt]______MINIGAMES______[/size][/b] [b]1.[/b] Castle Wars [img]http://www.tip.it/runescape/img2/cw%20-lobby.gif[/img] [b]2.[/b] Pest Control [img]http://images.stanzapub.com/readers/2009/10/22/pcscreen_1.png[/img] [b]3.[/b] Barrows [b][img]http://blogs.gamersinfo.net/media/barrows2.JPG[/img] 4.[/b] Jad MiniGame [img]http://i28.tinypic.com/2noff5.png[/img] [b]5.[/b] SoulWars [b][img]http://i46.tinypic.com/vy9p4w.png[/img] 6.[/b] Not Really a Minigame but (Clue Scrolls) [img]http://www.cluescrollhelp.info/wp-content/gallery/clue-scroll-images/thirdageplateqw6.png[/img] [size=20pt][color=blue]Thanks For checking out my Post, Hope you like my Server Idea!(:[/color] ,I got MSN [color=red]Joepkz@live.com[/color] ( Please don't add me before replying on My Post thanks,)[/size] [size=18pt][b]---(Applications)---[/b][/size] [b]Source coder:[/b]
(Source Coder) Name: MSN: How much exsperience Do you have with coding
[b]Client Coder:[/b]
(Source Coder) Name: MSN: How much exsperience Do you have with coding

item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

[quote=“sparta123, post:14, topic:396657”] yeah true, srry bout that, its cuz my server is down, and if i put some pics from my server it wuld kinda look boringish if you know what i mean… (no players since its not online atm (was tho) )
but if you look at the youtube vids you can see, but didnt want to put it in the POST cuz Noobs wuld start crap like “why you advertising your server? get of the forums!!” and stuff so thas why i didnt put a youtube link or anything… ;)[/quote]
To be a ‘good’ server you don’t have to have a lot of players, just keep working on your server and actually post pictures of your development.
